pricing.name: Starter
pricing.description: Perfect for small businesses and startups

pricing.name: Enterprise
pricing.description: For large organizations with complex needs

faq.question: What's included in the maintenance period?
faq.answer: Our maintenance period includes bug fixes, security updates, and minor feature improvements. Major feature additions may require additional development time and cost.

faq.question: Can I upgrade my plan later?
faq.answer: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time. We'll prorate the cost based on your remaining contract period.

faq.question: Do you offer custom solutions?
faq.answer: Yes, we offer fully customized solutions tailored to your specific business needs. Contact us to discuss your requirements.

faq.question: What's your development process?
faq.answer: We follow an agile development process with regular updates and client feedback. Each project includes planning, design, development, testing, and deployment phases.
